/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A red double-decker bus, a common sight in many Chinese cities, is seen driving down the road, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. On the sidewalk, a solitary figure can be seen walking, perhaps enjoying a leisurely stroll or heading towards their destination. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene.
